headline: Midstream Prepares For More Permian Natural Gas
summary: While the Permian tends to be known for its oil output, its production mix continues to get gassier, with gas production growth outpacing that of oil.

headline: Exxon expects EU to sign long-term US gas deals, FT reports
summary: The EU in July pledged to buy $750 billion of U.S. energy by 2028 as part of a sweeping trade pact with Washington.  "Long-term contracting remains at the core of the LNG business and the foundation that provides security of supply for our customers," an ExxonMobil spokesperson said in an emailed statement.  The EU declined to comment to Reuters.
